cab.content: miS DOCUMENT IS TBS PROPERTY HIS BRITAMIQ MAJESTY'S GrOVERHMBHT,S SCR g G.-T.-1873A.WAR C1BINEI.MEDICAL BOARDS .(Note by Mr, Long on the Memorandum bySecretary for Scotland,G.T.-1873).I desire to Say that I cordially support the view expressed in above. There is a good deal of local irritation and I believe the proposed transfer would cause great alarm.(Initialled) W.H.L.31st August, 1917.
